**size ** 5 inches 12 7 cm in diameter by 5 inches 12 7 cm tall candle can be any height desired
**yarn requirements ** acrylic 4-ply knitting worsted weight yarn * 1-1/2 oz gold brass or copper * 1/2 oz color or choice for candle * few yards yellow for flame **other requirements ** * size g hook * cardboard tube from paper towels * yarn needle > previously available at the crochet works http //www sarahanns com/crochetworks/brass html
